. Lectotype ♀ (ZIN), designated by

. TL: Georgia , Mtskheta- Mtianeti Region, Dusheti. Synonymy by

.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Nearctic hosts . Membracidae :
Ceresa borealis (Fairmaire)
,
C. bubalus (Fabricius)
,
C. taurina (Fitch)
,
Oncopsis sobrius (Walker)
,
Stictocephala inermis (Fabricius)
.
Distribution . Canada : BC, NS. USA : CO, DC, ID, IL, IN, KS, MD, MN, MO, NY, TX, VA.
